    Decrypts the specified cipher text.

    Task<byte[]> DecryptAsync(byte[] ciphertext, byte[] iv, byte[] authenticationData, byte[] authenticationTag, string algorithm, CancellationToken token)Function DecryptAsync(ciphertext As Byte(), iv As Byte(), authenticationData As Byte(), authenticationTag As Byte(), algorithm As String, token As CancellationToken) As Task(Of Byte())

      Byte()

      Byte()

      Byte[]
      Byte()

      The cipher text to decrypt

      String
      String

      The algorithm to use

    • token
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      Cancellation token

    Returns

    • Task<Byte[]>
      Task(Of Byte())

      The plain text

    Remarks

    If algorithm is not specified, an implementation should use its default algorithm. Not all algorithms require, or support, all parameters.
